WorkItem.Description:
While it appears under the ProtWarrior, Bear and ProtPaladin modules.   The selection of boxes pertaining to boss attack speed do not show up for the TankDK module under the buffs tab.   Nor does it appear to be checked (or unchecked) by selecting the 'Fully Buffed' or 'Unbuffed' presets.  
 
EDIT - TankDK module doesn't give the option of clicking 'Stat Multiplier' (Kings/Motw) either.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] DK Tank module not showing 'Boss Attack Speed'

Comments.Message: Note: The Boss Attack speed reduction was coming from internal if FF was being applied by the Tank itself in the rotation.  I'll add for the option that it's coming from someone else incase I implement a diseaseless rotation or something, but for now given the power of the 10% damage reduction by Scarlet Fever, I'm unlikely to do so.
